Keywords
Server on random port
  • ::pool::misc::rdServer (command)

::pool::misc::rdServer (command)
Starts a server socket on a randomly chosen port. The general idea of operation was taken from the Comm package by John R. LoVerso.
Argument: command The command to execute for a new connection accepted by the server socket.
Returns: The chosen port
